website_summaries.verdict: A well-built, good-sized soy milk maker that features a number of intelligent controls.
pros: This latest model from SoyaJoy includes advanced sensors for better cooking as well as an internal filter-free design for ease of cleaning
The 8 cooking options give this affordably priced machine a great deal of versatility and value
cons: While the 1.3 liter capacity is perfect for some, if you really enjoy your soy milk, it might not be large enough for your needs

customer_reviews.title: Too bad.
customer_reviews.text: [ASIN: B00DSC9PCG Soyapower G4 Soy Milk Maker, Almond Maker, Rice Milk Maker, Quinoa Milk Maker, and Soup Maker - New Model All Stainless Steel Inside] I bought this product on Jan. 29th 2017, it stopped working the other day, I only used it for almost 4 months. A stain thing came out of the motor and went to the shaft. It seems it was burned. A lot of steams came out when it was working and then it stopped working. How come I spent over a hundred dollar and only used it for 4 months? Can anyone help me? I added a photo here
customer_reviews.author: Xuecong Xu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work anymore!! What happened!?!? What happend??? The seller doesn't contact!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HK customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I use to have an older SoyaPower but after several yrs, it stopped working, so I recently got this new one. This new product is much the same as the older model BUT, they have greatly improved the cleanup process. I use to hate the cleanup process of my old one; the soy hardens in mins like concrete, it took the joy out of making soy. But now it so much easier to clean thanks to the inside unit being more encased. Thanks for improving this!!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado1

customer_reviews.title: Better than an earlier version in some ways
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model to replace an earlier model that just quit working one day after several years of use. This model is much easier to clean, which is wonderful. However, they really need to improve the design: evertyime I pour the finished soy milk from the maker into a jar or pitcher, a large amount of liquid dribbles all over the counter. Please improve the pouring spout! I can't report on durability because I haven't had it that long.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine.
customer_reviews.text: I am dairy free and don't like all the additives in store bought nut milk. I have used this Machine to make nut and soy milk every other day for almost 2 years. I love this machine. I will definitely buy again if i need too. It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value Soy Milk Maker
customer_reviews.text: Everyone else appears to recommend the "J" branded soy milk maker, but this brand I purchased has a couple extra features and is a bit easier to clean compared to the famous one. I like that it has a specific mung bean option, while the other does not. After comparing this unit and box to the other one, I suspect they are likely coming from the same factory. Reliable and consistent so far.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: The Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to assemble, easy to clean...Awesome Product! My family and I are enjoying freshly made Almond Milk daily. No artificial additive, no unhealthy hard to pronounce ingredients. JUST PLAIN AND FRESH RAW ORGANIC ALMONDS! VIOLA'!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself in no time
customer_reviews.text: I have made only one batch so far, but I am very impressed. Using only a half cup of soybeans yields almost a quart of soymilk in less than half an hour. No longer will we need to buy aseptic boxes of soymilk and all the accompanying additives! The appliance is solid and well made. The first cycle of grinding is a bit loud, but the rest of the processing is at a reasonable level. Looking forward to trying various recipes, and maybe even tofu!
customer_reviews.author: D. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Not good choice
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality! After one year, it cannot be used any more
customer_reviews.author: XunyangWu

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed the first time I used this machine and realized ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought one of these years ago but just recently found out about it from a friend. I had given up on making my own almond milk because the clean up was always a big mess. I was amazed the first time I used this machine and realized how quick and easy it was to make my own milk. I can't rave enough about how wonderful this machine is and clean up is so minimal. Thank you so much for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Milk maker, milk taste so much cleaner n better. Looking forward to try various milk concoctions.
customer_reviews.author: arisane underwood

customer_reviews.title: Less sauce
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an old nonfunctional one, soyapower plus. Use the same amount of soybean, it generates 30% less of sauce. Otherwise, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Coast

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. All I have to get the milk is just soak any kind of bean over night, add water and push the button. It's needed to clean by hand, can't put it in the dish washing machine due to the electrical part.
customer_reviews.author: kong

customer_reviews.title: makes soy milk. annoying beep, manual unplug to stop
customer_reviews.text: it makes soy milk all right. it beeps annoyingly and loudly when it ends, then you must unplug the power cord to stop it.
customer_reviews.author: DIY 77

customer_reviews.title: Soy milk! Indeed you are!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases from Amazon! With this I can make soy milk (also cashew and other nut milks), and then use that to make soy yogurt and tofu. It's really a marvelous little appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It' my first soy milk maker, and it couldn't be better! It makes a really tasty milk, and you can flavor it as you want. I think it's really quick (about 10~15 minutes if you pre-heat the water) with soaked soy grains. It produces about 1 liter (near a quart) per batch, enough for a couple . If you leave it alone after the end of the batch, it will keep the milk warm for about one hour. In that case, I found it a little harder to clean, because the okara sticks to the metallic parts. I'm a very satisfied customer and I will indicate it to as many people as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and tasty--what more could you ask for
customer_reviews.text: Easy and tasty--what more could you ask for? I am saving a ton of money by making my own milk at home, and I'm enjoying experimenting with the process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super easy and
customer_reviews.text: using it almost two or three times a week for making breakfasts. super easy and yummy
customer_reviews.author: Tellmeaboutit377

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked my old one better - it had the built in filter.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybyrd

customer_reviews.title: Great for making soy milk.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like it's planning to eat you while doing it, though. Good times all around.
customer_reviews.author: James Hodson

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: My first ever. New favorite appliance. Just right batch size for one or two people. So easy and fast. Fresh taste is amazing. Still looking for Plata recipes, but makes great chicken food.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Mnay useful functions
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my son. He has informed me of how useful it has been, having many functions to make various types of milks, smoothies, and drinks. He is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Curro

customer_reviews.title: so far works fine. i m quite impressed by
customer_reviews.text: still playing with it. so far works fine. i m quite impressed by it
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Make very good soy milk
customer_reviews.text: I've been using older version for years now and I loved it so bought this for my daughter who wants to make soy milk in her apartment as well.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: she makes soy milk two or even three times per day and the machine is still working good as i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Soy Milk Maker to my mom as a gift on her birthday! she just loves it, she makes soy milk two or even three times per day and the machine is still working good as i was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Remus G.

customer_reviews.title: Machine works really good sound pretty quiet and easy to use Hot soy ...
customer_reviews.text: I received in 2 days. I soaked soy bean about 6 hours. Machine works really good sound pretty quiet and easy to use Hot soy milk taste better then I expected. Machine looks pretty and I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: jinny park

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user and love it. It is so easy to use and clean. The soymilk is so much better than what can be purchased from a store.
customer_reviews.author: Ragouc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed in this item. I wanted it to make it easier to prepare nut and seed milks. It is quicker and easier using my old method of using my Vitamix Blender, which better breaks down nuts and seeds. The Soyapower might make soups or porridge's ok. If I bother to try that, I let you know. It was definitely NOT NOT NOT worth over $100 or even $75 for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL SAGHIR

customer_reviews.title: better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: Works great, & it is easier to clean.. also it doesn't have that annoying beep when it is done ta ta
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much we give it as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This unit makes wonderful soy and almond milk. We use it nearly every morning. Its so easy to use and clean, that we give them as gifts to friends and family without hesitation. I've found that if you soak the beans in the refrigerator, the resulting soy milk tastes smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Delicious homemade RAW almond and soy milk!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the Maker for a week or two, but have already made multiple batches of delicious and easy to make almond and soy milk. I am thoroughly impressed with this machine. Looking forward to all of the savings on store-bought almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instruction not too clear about the how to measure the volume to make.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times already and works great^^ Seem to be same technology as the soyajoy G4 but I like this design color better. Good build quality, easy to use. Will update review when I have more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Soyapower G4
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after few uses and I just find out that it cannot be returned after 90 days. IIt is completely useless and worthless, don't waste your money on the Soyapower. There is a reason why the window of return is only 90 days, it will break down in 3 months. My Vitamix can do a better job, and has no trouble after more than 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Tran

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not work at all. I plug it in nothing is happen, it is dead !!
customer_reviews.author: Men

customer_reviews.title: I love this soymilk maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soy milk maker and it is multi purpose. This is the second one I have had...ex-wife "lost" the other one I had, so I had to get a new one. These are very well made and durable machines. If you are looking for a soy milk maker...this is it! It also handles other "milks" like rice and nut based milks. You can also make rice porridge with it. Soyajoy is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Makes non dairy milk a snap to make at home
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and creates a wonderful product. The best nondairy milk I've ever drunk, completely under my own control as to how organic and pure it is. So far I've only used the raw function, but after an overnight soak of the nuts, it takes so little time and no effort to produce high-quality nondairy milk. This is also easy to clean. I have a rule: is it worth the counter or storage space? This definitely is.
customer_reviews.author: P Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Soymilk made easy
customer_reviews.text: Although a blender and stovetop might do, The Soyapower makes soymilk making easy. Throw in the soaked beans and filtered water, press a button, full automation. I love it. Some interesting recipes are also included. I'm fond of adding rolled oats to the soybeans, gives a sweeter flavor without adding sugar. I prefer organic soybeans and filtered water as they make me feel better about what I'm putting in my body. I also found some okara recipes online: "Soyburger supreme" turned out well. I like the Soyapower because it offers more options. I can make soymilk or grainmilk and other stuff with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Make Your Own Almond Milk the Easy Way
customer_reviews.text: I thought I no longer wanted to post reviews, but this product is so good that it deserves a review. Perfect aesthetically. It looks so simple, but beautiful to look at. The inside is made of stainless steel. We get to escape the toxic aluminum, silicone, plastics with hormone disruptors, etc. I get to make my own almond milk that tastes so good and fresh....without carrageenan and some. This is a very efficient little appliance. Making almond milk has become a very easy task to do now. The process is quick. And the price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecille Chan

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable - Simple, Yet Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I wanted homemade soy yogurt from homemade soymilk. I soak my beans for 24 hours,then add the beans to my SoyaPower and let it work it's magic. If I am in the mood for super thick and creamy milk/yogurt - I pour the milk from the SoyaPower to my Vitamix in two batches and blend the heck out of it, then strain. I waited for years to buy this machine because I didn't believe it could be so simple. Clean up is a cinch. I use cellophane wrap to protect the electrical connections and a quick hot soapy wash ... done.
customer_reviews.author: EyeLoveGlassesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Product works well at the begining but then suddenly broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works well at the begining but then suddenly broken. Machine seems to be on but when it starts running, my outlet switch off immediately due to the short circuit. Having a hard time to get customer support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: You can make soy milk with unsoaked beans if you put hot water (temperature 203F) directly in the jug. Make sure you use the "unsoaked bean" mode. The okara (soy residue) is a challenge to cook with. I personally use it with eggs and prawns. There is a okara fritter recipe as well -  It is easy to clean but you have to clean the jug before the bean residue dries up.
customer_reviews.author: S. Law

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and its size is just fit our family (1300 ml ) ,o very convenient to use . The package include the filter which is nice to have it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Mother and she loves it. I bought mine (an older model) about 4 years back and I use it all the time and love it. I bought mine based on the recommendation of a friend who has an even older model that they use all the time and love. Three generations of this and all customers have been very happy. The two current models are almost identical, I would chose based on the volume you want.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dad

customer_reviews.title: great soymilk maker machine ever
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with my soyapower g4. it got to me 3 days earlier than expected. i soaked 1/2 og the soy beans that came in it. and this morning I did my fisrt batch of soy milk. It came out so creammy, thick and delicious. Best imvestment ever. can't wait to try soups and other different milks. It is just the right size for my family. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brightergems

customer_reviews.title: brand new toy
customer_reviews.text: this is the first time I have had fresh soy milk. I have had store milk a lot, but this is so much better. I am looking forward to all the other milks I can make in this great machine. And I am finding many different ways to use the okara. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: arnold taylor

customer_reviews.title: I put the top part on the plate with perfect size so that the blades wouldn't touch anything
customer_reviews.text: so far I've tried soy milk and grain, and it worked well. The only problem I had is it's kind of difficult to handle the top with one hand and pour the milk out with the other hand. So I have to find a plate and lie the top part on it, and then pour out the milk and wash the machine. Because I'm not sure if letting the blades lie on the counter would hurt them, I put the top part on the plate with perfect size so that the blades wouldn't touch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very good for for everyone - thank you!
customer_reviews.text: First try worked perfectly - Easy to use - Of course my friend had one and recommended it, so it already had Kudos - Makes wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Theta

customer_reviews.title: The best and most reliable soy maker in the market.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this machine.The do all end all!Quick milk in minutes.Healthy nutritious and a good quality milk maker.I was taken by my first batch!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful machine, I could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful machine, I could not be happier. I feel it was a smart purchase. I no longer have to question what is in my drink. I should have done this a long time ago. Thank you SoyaPower.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I love my Soyapower G4
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. I use it every other day to make soy milk or nut milk. It tastes unbelievable! Nothing compared with the store-bought milks. It makes 32 oz of milk, which I use for making smoothies or just drinking as is. I stopped drinking regular milk and never looked back. I lost about 3.5 lbs without even trying. I did not make anything else using this machine except milk. Love it, love it, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty, easy to use and easy to clean. The soymilk I made tastes absolutely amazing. Best I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Jarad A. Sergent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, hope it will last long
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for making soy milk, fast and easy. I will try other recipe for other milks and soup too. Hope it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: KKT

customer_reviews.title: Nice but starting to act weird
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. You just have to be very careful. I know you can't submerge it but I tried to just tip the end into the sink to scoop up water but water still got into the machine. I mostly make rice milk in this. So I use the porridge setting. One day I did everything as normal and suddenly steam is billowing up out from under the lid. It had never done that before. I quickly unplugged it and let it dry out. The results of this machine are incredible but it is a finicky machine to use.
customer_reviews.author: Madameileen

customer_reviews.title: Makes great soy milk
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a soy milk maker that was broken. This Soyapower maker works great and we is easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Khanh N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product was in very good condition. It came very quickly and as advertised in the photograph and caption. I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Millasovich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Soy Milk Maker
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical after seeing the product with three tiny blades. After the soy milk was made, I was very happy with the quality of the milk. The soy pulp is on the bottom of the pot or the container after pouring out. If you hate the pulp, just pouring the soy milk from the top. The soy pulp is smoother than I expected. Washing the unit is easier if the two pieces are washed right after. A brush is a must for washing. The whole process takes about 20 minutes for soaked soy beans, I have not tried other options yet, dry beans, soup, raw juice, etc. I’m extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: almond milk
customer_reviews.text: very simple i use it to make almond milk only so far so good only have it a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Farrell C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great soybean milk maker. It is very durable. If you dont like this color or something like that, then pick something thats G4 or G5 This machine is very powerful
customer_reviews.author: Ke Jiang

customer_reviews.title: works fine, I still need to figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: works fine, I still need to figure out how to use the leftover "pulp" - in my case, almond "pulp" sweetened with honey
customer_reviews.author: Miss Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Bit big for just one person use, but that can't be helped.
customer_reviews.author: HomeMaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, and use it make almond and peanuts milk very often. very worth to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: User-friendly, easy to clean, big noise at the beginning,i later there will be no noise, generally speaking, worth the value
customer_reviews.author: kekehu

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make, easy to clean. Using this machine is much easier than a nut bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it. I purchased this item on July ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. I purchased this item on July 2016, after three months, it does not working. I give up on send it back to fix it, because I do not believe after they fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Yirui Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cant wait for it to show up!! I got the almonds on the way as well !!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry-Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: great soymilk
customer_reviews.text: I have had an old soyajoy for many years, with the screen built in. This machine is wonderful! Love not having to clean the screen, but will take use to straining the soymilk in a strainer!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine B. Mohler

product_meta.title: Soyapower G4 Soy Milk Maker, Almond Milk Maker, Rice Milk Maker, and Soup Maker - New Model All Stainless Steel Inside
feature_bullets: Newest 1.3 liter model replacing the best selling SoyaPower Plus, with thermo-plastic outliner and bottom heating technology
All stainless steel grinding and cooking chamber with stain-resistant, leach-proof, insulating plastic outer layer
Eight automatic, one-button functions for fully cooked soup and beverages, as well as raw milks from beans, grains, and nuts.
Advanced temperature and water level sensors for intelligent cooking cycles, with 4th-generation internal filter-free design for easy cleaning.
Solid-state power controls for superior performance and durability (for US power supply only).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
